titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 140 Merriman Road in Garden City, Michigan, as the "John J. Shivnen Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
9/8/2008--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 140 Merriman Road in Garden City, Michigan, as the "John J. Shivnen Post Office Building."
